changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE contacts ( id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, uuid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, account_id BIGINT, address_id BIGINT, salutation VARCHAR(256), first_name VARCHAR(256), last_name VARCHAR(256), title VARCHAR(256), email VARCHAR(256), phone VARCHAR(256), -- mobile VARCHAR(256), fax VARCHAR(256), report_to BIGINT, department VARCHAR(256), contact_owner VARCHAR(36), updated_by VARCHAR(256), created_by BIGINT, updated_at TIMESTAMP, created_at TIMESTAMP, status VARCHAR(256), is_deleted TINYINT );
